Real Name: Lyja
Special Powers
FRIEND...OR FOE?: Enhancement. Perplex, but only if adjacent to an opposing character.
ATTACKING FROM THE SHADOWS: Charge, Stealth. // When Lyja occupies hindering terrain and uses Charge, modify her attack and damage +1.

April 16, 2021
hoojeebo
You're checking for hindering when you use/activate Charge. If she starts her Charge action in hindering terrain, she gets the bonus.
April 16, 2021
pokolo
does the +1 to damage and attack still apply if she moves out of hindering while using charge? like she started in hindering but actually ends up outside of hindering when making the attack? and conversely if she triggers charge outside of hindering and ends up in hindering while attacking?
February 11, 2021
Goop
She can charge for 12atk/4dmg thats pretty crazy for 50pts. Also 50/50 on her shape change thanks to skrull team ability. Enhancement is a little odd since she is mostly a melee attacker but she does have range so she could be paired with other range guys from time to time. Good piece for sure, well worth her value.
